description: Source file defining protected API endpoints in a FastAPI application, requiring user authentication and role-based access control.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] me(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve current authenticated user's basic identity information.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] protected_example(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to provide identity info for authenticated user, protected by bearer token.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] protected_admin_example( user: AuthenticatedUser = Depends(require_roles(["admin", "realm-admin"])), )
methods.description: Role-protected endpoint accessible only to users with specified roles.

ctags.name: me
ctags.pattern: /^async def me(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user)) -> Dict[str, Any]:$/

ctags.name: protected_example
ctags.pattern: /^async def protected_example(user: AuthenticatedUser = Security(get_current_user)) -> Dict[str, A/
